text: Paul Germain (born June 6, 1959) is an American animation screenwriter, television producer, director, and voice director. Among the Disney shows Germain has been know for writing, producing, or directing, are Recess, Even Stevens, Lloyd in Space, and Goldie & Bear. He was also a producer of Recess: School's Out. Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:American television producers
title: Paul Germain
